headline: Darling Ingredients Inc. (DAR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Darling Ingredients Inc. on The Few Bets That Matter’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DAR. Darling Ingredients Inc.’s share was trading at $52.68 as of February 24th. DAR’s trailing and forward P/E were 135.08 and 9.48 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Darling Ingredients (DAR) is the world’s largest renderer, converting animal byproducts like fats, bones, grease, and used cooking oil from slaughterhouses, restaurants,
